roleset.name: to fertilize by transfering pollen
roleset.note: POLLINATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pollinate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pollinate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` It [*EXP*-2] 's one thing [*]to say [0] you can sterilize , and another [*] to then successfully pollinate the plant , '' he said [*T*-1] .
